original: a'arya dz'am gu l'i sva dha nam /
analyzed: a'arya dz'am gu l'i sva dha nam /

original: 'phags ma dug sel ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: 'phags ma dug sel ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Achievement of the Noble Jaṅgulī

original: 'phags ma dug sel ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma dug sel ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: @157b sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid du bsgoms pa'i rjes la chu skyes dmar po dang / zla ba la dz'am yig ser po yongs su gyur pa las 'phags ma dug sel ma'i bdag nyid du skad cig gis bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: @157b sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid du bsgoms pa'i rjes la chu skyes dmar po dang / zla ba la dz'am yig ser po yongs su gyur pa las 'phags ma dug sel ma'i bdag nyid du skad cig gis bskyed par bya ste /
translated: After meditating on emptiness by the rite previously taught, one should generate oneself instantly in the form of the Noble Jaṅgulī from a yellow jaṃ letter on a red lotus and moon.

original: sku mdog ser mo zhal gsum ma /
analyzed: sku mdog ser mo zhal gsum ma /
translated: She is yellow, with three faces,

original: sngon po dang / dkar po ni g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
analyzed: sngon po dang / dkar po ni g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
translated: The right and left faces are blue and white.

original: ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / mda' rnams ni g-yas kyi phyag gsum na'o //
analyzed: ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / mda' rnams ni g-yas kyi phyag gsum na'o //
translated: In the three right hands are a sword, a vajra, and an arrow.

original: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / dug gi me tog dang / gzhu ba kang ba phyag g-yon pa gsum na'o //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / dug gi me tog dang / gzhu ba kang ba phyag g-yon pa gsum na'o //
translated: In the three left hands are a lasso with a threatening forefinger, a poisonous flower, and a full bow.

original: gdengs ka rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus la gnas pa /
analyzed: gdengs ka rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus la gnas pa /
translated: She stands in the center of a halo of light-rays.

original: sprul dang mdzes pa'i gos dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: sprul dang mdzes pa'i gos dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: Adorned with beautiful garments and ornaments,

original: gzhon nu ma'i mtshan nyid 'bar ba /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma'i mtshan nyid 'bar ba /
translated: blazing with the characteristics of a young woman,

original: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsgoms nas sngags bzlas par bya'o /
analyzed: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsgoms nas sngags bzlas par bya'o /
translated: and imagined as having Akṣobhya as her head ornament, one should recite the mantra.

original: aom dz'am gu l'i sarba bi sha pra sha ma ni phu:sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom dz'am gu l'i sarba bi sha pra sha ma ni phu:sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ jaṃ guli sarva-viṣa praśamana phuḥ svāhā.

original: 'phags ma dug sel ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'phags ma dug sel ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Āryā Jāngulī is complete.
